name: Shadows (itch) (otisyu)
description:
Shadows is currently a prototype .

Controls:

  • [W] [S] [A] [D] Move character
  • [F] Hide in shadows & out of shadows . 
  • [R] Stick cat's head out from shadows
  • [Space] Jump & Exit from shadows
  • [Shift] Run

Credits:

  • Background music by SoundsCrate 
  • Graphic assets by Pixel Frog's Pixel Adventure 1
